BIO

2020 - Current

Became a Software Developer

Full Stack Developer

2020 was a factor full of many challenges, the new coronavirus paralyzed the world, but it opened me the opportunity to focus on my goal, so I arranged the ideas and did a comprehensive review of everything I learned during the past year, and developed a roadmap to reach my goal to be a real developer, and I came out of the stage Learning to build real apps like Google clone, Twitter clone, blogging site creation, etc...
I am still in a state of continuous learning.
